Article.ArticleTitle: Less - known medicinal uses of plants among the rural women of shahjahanpur district, u.p.

AbstractText: During the present study a valuable phytotherepeutic information on the various ailments of women was collected from the district, Traditionally the rural women prefer plant medicines than the modern medicines for their diseases including abortion, menstrual trouble, conception disorders, sterility, delivery problems etc, prevailing among them, Eighteen medicinal plants have been reported after making interview of medicine of the villages. The plants are arranged in alphabetical order according to the botanical names followed by family, vernacular names and herbarium number.

AffiliationInfo.Affiliation: Postgraduate Department of Botany, G.F. College, Shahjahanpur - 240001, India.
